===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[return]]; to [[go]] [[back]]; to [[go]]; to [[leave]]
#: {{zh-x|找不{bu}到 回去 的 路|to be unable to find the way '''back'''}}
#: {{zh-x|你 先 回去 吧。|You '''go back''' first.}}
# to go back {{gloss|used after a verb to indicate direction away from speaker}}
#: {{zh-x|走 回去|to walk '''back'''}}
#: {{zh-x|带 回去|to take '''back'''}}

====Usage notes====
In Chinese there is often no distinction made between "return" and "leave"; {{zh-l|回去|tr=huíqù}} can be translated either way depending on the situation.

* {{qualifier|Cantonese}} {{zh-l|返去|faan1 heoi3}}
